name: infield
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the part of a cricket or baseball field that is closest to the player who hits the ball, or the group of players there: the infield She was rarely able to hit the ball out of the infield. He usually plays in the infield. Compare
outfield
More examplesFewer examplesThe coaches decided to move him to the infield.They spray water onto the clay infields every night.Knight stood in the infield, wrapped up in a long sweater.
